alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 24 at 12:50AM MDT until June 24 at 2:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR SOUTHWESTERN HAAKON AND EAST CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1250 AM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms had produced heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams and county roads as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Philip, Grindstone and Grindstone Butte. This includes the following streams and drainages... North Fork Bad River, Medicine Creek and Grindstone Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
